it.polimi.se2018.server.network.rmi

Class RmiServerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • it.polimi.se2018.server.network.rmi.RmiServerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RmiServerInterface, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class RmiServerImpl
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements RmiServerInterface
    Class RmiServerImpl: the class is a subclass of RmiServerInterface, so it's responsible of the implementation of all the method of the interface, the Impl is linked to the Server where it's running and have a list of the clients rmi connected to the server. The methods of the class are remotely called by the client
    Author:
    fadda-miceli-mundo
    See Also:
    RmiServerInterface, Serialized Form
